description: This course introduces students to intensive research at St. Olaf and the Boulder
Laboratory for 3-D Electron Microscopy of Cells at the University of Colorado. In
Boulder, students prepare samples for electron microscopy and immuno-gold Electron
Microscopy, capture EM-images, and generate 3-D Tomograms. At St. Olaf students generate
3-D computer models of their datasets. Offered periodically during Interim. Prerequisite:
three courses in biology or permission of instructor.
